channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [AMQ-2818] jetty-realm.properties is not found when starting ActiveMQ in console mode on OSX
item.description:
/usr/local/apache-activemq-5.4-SNAPSHOT$ bin/macosx/activemq console
Running ActiveMQ Broker...

wrapper | Launching a JVM...

OSX 10.5.6
Apple MacBook Pro
java version "1.5.0_22"

item.summary: jetty-realm.properties is not found when starting ActiveMQ in console mode on OSX

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fixed with svn revision 962519.

Incidentally I renamed bin/activemq fgstart task to console
